text: You need to believe in something. Or you don't want to live.
author: Vesemir

text: Living forever does not mean living life full of life.
author: Olgerd fon Everek

text: Love is not always poetry. Sometimes it is disgustingly prosaic.
author: Geralt of Rivia

text: Better to do a little more, albeit in vain, than to do a little less and then regret it.
author: Witold von Everek

text: Life does not always resemble a fairy tale, but you have to believe in something.
author: Geralt of Rivia

text: If a woman doesn't say something, that doesn't mean she doesn't mean it. I will say more, there are situations when they say one thing and want something completely different ...
author: Zoltan Chivay

text: Your ass is like a nut, it asks a sin, why not.
author: Buttercup

text: What a beauty - you have retained this charming ability to wonder at the world! Hmm, usually it is inherent only in children, poor knights and idiots.
author: Keira Metz

text: People need three things to live: food, drink and gossip.
author: Buttercup

text: Fuck, i'm in a bad position ... like five crowns in shit ..
author: Zoltan Chivay

text: Craft - it's like fucking a woman. Find the rhythm and you will succeed ...
author: Blacksmith from Bliss

text: Be careful about your desires. And if the wish comes true, accept the consequences with dignity.
author: Yennefer of Vengerberg

text: Don't ask questions that you already know the answer to. It looks ridiculous.
author: Philipa Eilhart

text: I wish to want as much as I do not want!
author: Cottier

text: Better not spoil with us, if want remains intact the ... oh, Geralt, I would say in rhyme, but here the lady...
author: Zoltan Chivay

text: Listen to your instincts, even if you do shit, you will do it in agreement with yourself.
author: Mousehovur

text: I'll tell you this: if someone licks your ass today, tomorrow he will bite for it.
author: Innkeeper
